Enabling telemetry allows SentryGuard to: Enabling telemetry allows SentryGuard to monitor your vehicle's Sentry Mode status in real-time without draining your battery. When suspicious activity is detected, you'll receive instant alerts via Telegram.
End-to-end encrypted communication with: End-to-end encrypted communication with Tesla's official API. Your data stays yours.
If donations no longer cover expenses, t: If donations no longer cover expenses, the service may shut down, become paid (at actual cost, around $0.50/user), or be limited to current users. Your support keeps it free and open!
